text:
The Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO), Ministry of Labour, Government of India, Regional Office, Tambaram, will conduct ‘Nidhi Aapke Nikhat’ (PF Near You) at EPFO Regional Office, Rajaji Salai, West Tambaram, on March 10. The schedule for subscribers is between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m.. For employers and exempted establishments, it is between 12 noon and 1 p.m.

Ph: 044-22261141 / 22264376.
title: PF Near You
